title: HoP 295 - The Most Christian Doctor - Jean Gerson
itunes:title: HoP 295 - The Most Christian Doctor - Jean Gerson
description: Jean Gerson’s role in the political disputes of his day, the spread of lay devotion and affective mysticism, and the debate over the Romance of the Rose initiated by Christine de Pizan.
